lead_paragraph: CoCo Vandeweghe gave the United States an early lead and Jack Sock clinched the Americans' opening match Sunday at the Hopman Cup mixed teams tournament.
snippet: CoCo Vandeweghe gave the United States an early lead and Jack Sock clinched the Americans' opening match Sunday at the Hopman Cup mixed teams tournament....

headline.main: Americans Win 1st Match at Hopman Cup Mixed Teams Event
headline.print_headline: Americans Win 1st Match at Hopman Cup Mixed Teams Event
